title: If you can get a discount on a bundle because you own one or more skins in it... Red Resp. Requested
body: If you can get a discount on a bundle because you own one or more skins in it shouldn't that concept should apply to Chroma Packs ( CP ) as well? I own Garen but would have to pay full price for his CP ( I don't intend to buy Garen's CP but I noticed upon clicking it that I don't get a discount ) and I've noticed this same result when clicking on the CP for both Master Yi and Nasus. I guess this is more of a thread regarding the concept of how skins/CP are sold as opposed to a concept for a new skin but I couldn't decide the best place to ask on the Boards. I'd welcome a response from Riot explaining this too if anybody working feels they have the time.

replies.body:
Hey StefNBennett,

We aren't currently offering discounts on chroma packs. While they're living in the 'Bundles' section, they're not the same as the sale bundles you see rotate through the shop. Chroma packs are permanently in the store. 

 If you're purchasing one of the Team Championship bundles, the RP amount will decrease if you own some of the content in the bundle. For chroma packs, they're currently sold at a flat rate of 590 RP, and you would need to own the champion or the champion + skin in cases like Pool Party Leona.

Thank you for responding, RiotKateyKhaos.

What you said and the way you explained it makes a bit of sense but I'd like to pose a hypothetical just to make sure I'm 100% understanding you: If I were to buy Fizz or Dreadknight Nasus ( I already own Nasus ) the price of the CP would drop from their current price down to 590 RP?

Future edit: KK Cruisin answered the hypothetical for me in a different post ( see quote below ) on this thread. Thanks again though for your original reply to it.

 That's right, this is nowhere else for them. So if it was a concern, they'd make another board and move them. Since they haven't, it isn't.
Chroma packs aren't discounted to begin with. If you need the champion or the skin, the pack will group everything up for convenience.
I understand that but what I'm wondering is why you wouldn't get a discount for owning the champion/champion & skin featured in the CP.

No, you don't understand. These are not discounted bundles. The system detects which components are needed and puts them into one place so that the buyer doesn't need to search through 3 different tabs in the store. The pricing for the bundle reflects the total cost of the chroma plus the other stuff if those also need to be purchased.

Let's run through the pricing for Dreadknight Nasus Plague:

- Base price for a chroma pack is 590
- If you also need the skin, the price increases to 1565 (590+975)
- If you also need the champion, the price increases once again to 2150 (585+590+975)
Ah, you should have explained it like that in the first place. I guess I misunderstood what you originally said and thank you for clearing up my confusion in regards to my question.
